#resources/telenor 

* Division in [[Telenor group]], tasked to drive development and operations all everything digital/IT
* It's led by [[Torbjorn]]
## Reflections
* There is a general dilemma about striking the right balances between quality/sustainability and speed/growth. There is little space for teams to follow guiding principles
* The capacity is allocated based on this process: [[IT Resource Allocation process]]
* 2025-07-03
	* Vision: "We are a digital frontrunner driving value creation, insights, and continuous learning"
	* Objectives
